council_profile.name: Fylde Borough Council
council_profile.covers: Fylde district on the Lancashire coast, including Lytham St Annes, Kirkham and Warton
notable_issues: Affluent coastal district — Lytham St Annes among most desirable addresses in Lancashire
BAE Systems Warton — major aerospace employer
Longest spending dataset of all 15 councils (11 financial years from 2015)
Highest year-end spending spike (16.9x in COMMUNITY SERVICES)
Benford Law analysis passed — 2.7%% deviation within normal range

data_quality.transparency_notes: Fylde Borough Council publishes spending data over £500.

cross_council_context.note: Fylde Borough Council is a district council in Lancashire. Comparable to other Lancashire district councils.
